oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A girl, when men should not have been looked upon by her for fear of harm to them, saw some people eating together at a rock rabbits house of branches. In consequence of this, they and the house, fixed by her looks, became stars in the sky, and are now to be seen there as the Corona Australis. This myth was told to //kabbos mother by her own mother (L II.-37. 3333-3343). Corona Australis
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Corona Australis =nabbe ta !nu ()
